item.description:
This is a trip organized by our members Stan and Barry through the Date Me I'm Jewish meet-up! Please contact them for information! See information below! As of June 2nd there were 6 seats left!
Foxwoods & concert for singles 40+
Saturday, June 6, 2009
“LEGENDS IN CONCERT”™
Direct from Las Vegas! “Legends in Concert” is the longest-running celebrity tribute show in entertainment history! It features live re-creations of superstars of yesterday and today, backed by a live orchestra and dancers. “Legends in Concert” is a true entertainment spectacular!
Elvis Cher Tom Jones Rod Stewart Whitney Houston
Package includes:
�� Round-trip chartered bus from Newton & Framingham
�� $20 all-you-can eat buffet dinner
�� $15 in free bets
�� A ticket to the Legends concert
Cost is only $69 per person.
SPACE IS LIMITED AND ADVANCED RESERVATION IS REQUIRED BY MAY 27TH.
Bus leaves Newton at 2 PM; Framingham at 2:20 and departs
Foxwoods at 10 PM. Please arrive at least 15 minutes before departure.
To reserve your space, send check for $69 with completed reservation form to:
DMIJ, PO Box 82, Brockton, MA 02303. *
*Payment policy: There are no credits or refunds unless we cancel the trip. All sales are final.
For further information call Barry at 508-333-1466 or Stan at 508-572-9049
----��------ RESERVATION FORM -------��------ CUT HERE AND RETURN WITH PAYMENT -------
Name ___________________________________________________________
Address ________________________________ City _________________________ZIP _______
Home Tel. (_______) _______________________ Cell (_______) _______________________
Email _________________________________________________________________________
Pick up / drop off preference: ____ Newton - Riverside “T” ____ Framingham Shoppers World at glass bus stop near Barnes & Noble Amount enclosed $_________
Send a check for $69 with completed reservation form to: DMIJ, PO Box 82, Brockton, MA 02303
item.name: Foxwoods and concert with Date Me I'm Jewish
